pages.text: Encountering an Ignited Revenant has been a surprised. Who knew one can revive the dead through fire? With your knowledge on blazes and necromancy, you've figured out how to have your own revenant.
The revenant can be healed by feeding it bones, blaze rods or blaze powder, and can passively heal if their owner dons a Necro Cape.
When extinguished, these fiery revenants will drop their burning cores which can possess a Blaze to return from the dead.
